Race.SpecificTitle: City of New Iberia -- 1/2% S&U Tax - CC - Perp.
Race.SummaryText:
City of New Iberia Proposition
(Sales Tax)
Race.FullText: Shall the City of New Iberia, State of Louisiana (the "City"), be authorized to levy and collect a tax of one-half of one percent (1/2%) (the "Tax") upon sale at retail, the use, the lease or rental, the consumption, and storage for use or consumption, of tangible personal property and on sales of services in the City, all as defined by law (an estimated $3,000,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), commencing January 1, 2018, and continuing in perpetuity, with the avails and proceeds of the Tax (after paying reasonable and necessary costs and expenses of collecting and administering the Tax) received by the City to be used solely for the purposes of a New Iberia Police Department and providing funding assistance to the New Iberia Fire Department?
